channel.title: ssh on 博客
channel.description: Recent content in ssh on 博客

item.title: ssh常见问题
item.description: 记录遇到的ssh问题 Connecting to 1.116.126.*:22… Connection established. To escape to local shell, press Ctrl+Alt+] Socket error Event: 32 Error: 10053. Connection closing…Socket close. Connection closed by foreign host. Disconnected from remote host(1.116.126.*) at 15:17:58. 检查端口和协议 改port防扫描 sudo vim /etc/ssh/sshd_config sudo service ssh restart
